channel.title: Comments on: Pivotal Tracker launches new API in public beta

item.title: By: Bruno Pedro
item.dc:creator: Bruno Pedro
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/08/19/pivotal-tracker-new-api/#comment-232">Dan P</a>.
Thanks for the clarification, Dan. Let me know when you update the activity web hook documentation and I'll update the article.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dan P.

Thanks for the clarification, Dan. Let me know when you update the activity web hook documentation and I’ll update the article.

item.title: By: Dan P
item.dc:creator: Dan P
item.description: Thanks for the write up, Bruno. One clarification - the activity web hook (in V5 format) does in fact post in JSON, we just haven't yet updated the activity web hook help page. When setting up the webhook for a project, you can specify the old V3 XML format, or the new V5 JSON format.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the write up, Bruno. One clarification – the activity web hook (in V5 format) does in fact post in JSON, we just haven’t yet updated the activity web hook help page. When setting up the webhook for a project, you can specify the old V3 XML format, or the new V5 JSON format.
